title: Azure Networking Deep Dive
summary: Explore key elements of Azure network architecture including VWAN, NSGs, routing and security design.
content:
## Azure Networking Deep Dive

This post explores advanced Azure networking topics:

- Virtual WAN setup
- Routing weight conflicts
- Hub-spoke model with Azure Firewall
- NSG rules and diagnostics

_Nikhil shares his real-world troubleshooting from complex enterprise networks._

title: Getting Started with Cloud Automation
summary: Best practices on scripting Azure infrastructure using PowerShell and Terraform.
content:
## Getting Started with Cloud Automation

This blog introduces infrastructure as code for Azure:

- Using PowerShell to automate Azure VM setup
- Upgrading Public IPs (Basic to Standard)

_Focus on practical, script-driven DevOps for Azure Cloud._
